amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 115-679 to streamline the sign up process for Agriculture Risk Coverage (ARC) and Price Loss Coverage (PLC) by directing the Secretary of Agriculture to change the regulatory requirements from an annual sign up to a `one and done' process for ARC and PLC only.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaHood amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. LaHood.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaHood amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
